attributes.action: effect of alcohal abuse in the society
attributes.additional_details:
I  would like to draw the attention of the government towards bad effects of the misuse of the alcohal by more youger peoples than older  and the burden on every household by paying more taxes to run the police, hospitals and their staff and ambulences,  is getting out of control. i want the government should bring the licences of the public houses back to 60s and 70s.
And keep tighter control on issuing the amount of off licences in the local areas. i have at least 25 off licences shops selling all sort of alcohal in my area. and day by day its increasing, due to that there are so many day time roberies are taking place in my area.My wifes gold chane was snetched just yadrs from my house,and old people and children and womens are not safe in todays Briton. So please pay more attention into this matter and make safe Briton for every one, and at last i will request to all the MPs to watch last nights (01/08/2011) PANORAMA PROGRRAME. MORE TO SAY BUT LACK OF SPACE.THANKS
